meanings.definition: Not inclined to associate with others.
meanings.sent1: The unsociably cat avoided the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent2: She has always been known as an unsociably person.
meanings.sent3: The unsociably squirrel refused to share its nuts.
meanings.sent4: The unsociably mountain stood alone against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The unsociably student preferred studying alone in the library.
